Quick Delivery

Welcome to Bahri Cargo Movers Pvt. Ltd.

BCM has been the leading transport and logistics in Rajpura,Punjab since 1970.

As a part of the logistics team we belive in delivering the frieght goods quickly and safely.We majorly focus in customer satisfaction.

Our Sole aim behind this buisness was enabling growth, providing efficient and prompt logistics, frieght forwarding and transportation solutions for EX/IM bound cargo.We also offer various other services like Warehousing, courier service, etc.

We tend to remain in the lead and we are also looking forward to open another franchise in the coming future.
